screenshots.caption: The one and only window.  Not much to look at, but it works.

name: File Grouper
short_description: A little utility for grouping files (including recursively into directories) into groups of sizes no bigger than a set amount.  For example, set the max size to 700 MB to group files into groups for burning CDs.
